amendment.description: To require a pilot program on cryptologic service training.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3365 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3365 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To require a pilot program on cryptologic service training.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3365 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3365 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Graham FL.
